website_summaries.verdict: An impressive drone, but its camera doesn't quite have the capabilities of our Best of the Best pick.
pros: This sturdy and easy-to-use drone has 4K video and advanced obstacle avoiding technology
Captures smooth video and sharp pictures
cons: Bad batteries and glitches have been reported

customer_reviews.title: DJI flyaway and crash
customer_reviews.text: Phantom 4 pro lost GPS in pmode with a lot of satellites and then proceeded to go into atti mode and fly backwards while ignoring user input. The drone flew full speed into a pole. Instead of honoring their warranty DJI has done nothing but given me the run-around. Amazon doesn't care that their merchant sold a product and the manufacturer isn't upholding their warranty. Do not buy a DJI product and do not buy an expensive electronic off of Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: DJI not so good
customer_reviews.text: Crashed on 2nd Flight - This is my 2nd Phantom 4 Pro and both crashed for no reason at all they just fall from the Sky and both times only about 300 feet from were they took off - Just drop and hit the ground and break . Wont buy another on ever that is over $2000 for about 5 flights total with 2 of these - Neither was my fault didn't crash they just fall right in front of me .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun. Don't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: First one was a dud. It would lose connection the the remote completely after 8 minutes no matter what I would try. I am so happy I bought on Amazon. One click and I exchanged it. DJI support is useless so you have to make sure you try everything you can and seek help from others or forums for assistance. Buy from Amazon so you can have protection for a situation like mine. A buddy of mine bought it from a local store and has had noting but issues getting it exchanged for a new unit, they try to troubleshoot it, due to the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Herman Munster

customer_reviews.title: Crashy and Glitchy
customer_reviews.text: I managed to crash this thing twice (once, completely destroying it), got sick of the constant error messages and warnings popping up on the screen, that I sold it and all the attendant accessories I bought. I feel much better with a completely different UAV and am actually starting to make money doing aerial videography. What an annoying pos.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Battery connector melted!  Happened twice and DJI refused to fix the second time under warranty.
customer_reviews.text: My Phantom 4 pro worked great for about 9 months. Then the battery was very difficult to remove one time. After prying the battery loose, I found melted battery contacts. Returned to DJI for repair and got refurbished unit. After one month the battery connectors melted again. Returned to DJI again under warranty, they returned the SAME drone with no repairs performed. AFTER BEING LIED TO AND SCREWED OVER, I sold the phantom 4 for a loss. Completely worthless service and frustrating design flaws that DJI refuses to fix made me never buy their products again.
customer_reviews.author: Stewie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite drone so far!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of DJI drones including the Phantom 3 Pro, Mavic Pro, and Mavic Air. The Phantom 4 Pro is my favorite for image quality. While it's not as portable as the Mavics, image quality can't be beat except by the Inspires. At this price you can get brilliant photos and beautiful video. Everything is solid about this, the connection to remote, flying in wind or cold. I've taken this to Iceland and it performed great. It's almost time for the Phantom 5 but this one will always be high on my list.
customer_reviews.author: DKP

customer_reviews.title: Get training and practice to prevent issues.
customer_reviews.text: Not a toy. This thing takes a bit of serious consideration to prevent things from going wrong. Know what airspace you’re in. Geo fencing is a thing. Be familiar with what not to do and how to respond to flyaway and controller issues. Know about batteries and prop maintenance and use observers as needed. Most drone related injuries occur during lost drone recovery so think twice about crossing that river or going up that tree..
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE - FAULTY DRONES
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE! They sold me a faulty drone on here and are now failing to honor the return policy after explaining exactly what the problem is and calling and emailing several times (over a two month span). I would choose another vendor for your drone purchases if you want to get something that works. BTW - the drone I had the remote would not hold a charge and the flight path was off. Contact me if you have any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tiland

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon received.
customer_reviews.text: When I received my drone, the first thing I notice was the box being damaged & look like it was open & re sealed, thinking ok no biggy when opening the box the foam container which it came in was messed up & further opening the case the drone was damaged.

customer_reviews.title: The drone flies fine, but BE CAREFUL that your drone you bought may be used before.
customer_reviews.text: I won't comment on Phantom 4 PRO itself. The drone itself is good. I am commenting about the seller. Despite the cheap price compared to those solder from DJI.com, it means that you may not get a whole new one. First I found that 4 out of the 8 propellers had the plastic wraps at the pivot gone, which may be a sign of the previous usage. Then when I started using the drone for the first time, there is no need for the drone activation, which indicated that the drone was activated before, so it is definitely a used one. The seller should be clear about this.
